00057 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_PrivateTester {

00061     EGS_PrivateTester(EGS_GeometryTester *, EGS_Input *);
00062     ~EGS_PrivateTester() {
00063         /*
00064         if( inside_shape ) delete inside_shape;
00065         if( inside_time_shape ) delete inside_time_shape;
00066         if( hownear_shape ) delete hownear_shape;
00067         if( howfar_shape ) delete howfar_shape;
00068         if( howfar_time_shape ) delete howfar_time_shape;
00069         */
00070         EGS_Object::deleteObject(inside_shape);
00071         EGS_Object::deleteObject(inside_time_shape);
00072         EGS_Object::deleteObject(hownear_shape);
00073         EGS_Object::deleteObject(hownear_time_shape);
00074         EGS_Object::deleteObject(howfar_shape);
00075         EGS_Object::deleteObject(howfar_time_shape);
00076     };
00077     void testInside(EGS_BaseGeometry *);
00078     void testInsideTime(EGS_BaseGeometry *);
00079     void testHownear(int ntry, EGS_BaseGeometry *);
00080     void testHownearTime(EGS_BaseGeometry *);
00081     void testHowfar(EGS_BaseGeometry *, bool time);

00084     FILE *fp_this_test;

00119 EGS_GeometryTester::EGS_GeometryTester(EGS_Input *i) {
00120     p = new EGS_PrivateTester(this,i);
00121 }
00122 
00123 EGS_GeometryTester::~EGS_GeometryTester() { delete p; }
00124 
00125 void EGS_GeometryTester::testInside(EGS_BaseGeometry *g) { p->testInside(g); }
00126 
00127 void EGS_GeometryTester::testInsideTime(EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00128     p->testInsideTime(g);
00129 }

00147 void EGS_GeometryTester::printPosition(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00148     fprintf(p->fp_this_test,"%g %g %g\n",x.x,x.y,x.z);
00149 };

00151 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00152 EGS_PrivateTester::EGS_PrivateTester(EGS_GeometryTester *p, EGS_Input *input){
00153     if( !p ) egsFatal("EGS_PrivateTester::EGS_PrivateTester:\n"
00154           " attempt to construct a tester with a null parent\n");
00155     parent = p; rndm = 0; n_inside = 0; n_inside_time = 0;
00156     n_hownear = 0; n_hownear_time = 0; n_howfar = 0; n_howfar_time = 0;
00157     inside_shape = 0; inside_time_shape = 0;
00158     hownear_shape = 0; howfar_shape = 0;
00159     hownear_time_shape = 0;
00160     howfar_time_shape = 0; hownear_shape = 0;
00161     store_steps = true;
00162     check_infinity = true;
00163     fp_info = stdout; fp_warn = stderr;
00164     fp_inside = stdout; fp_hownear = stdout; fp_howfar = stdout;
00165 
00166     rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG(input);
00167     if ( !rndm ) rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::defaultRNG();
00168 
00169     setTest(input,"inside test",n_inside,&inside_shape);
00170     fp_inside = fp_this_test;
00171 
00172     setTest(input,"inside time test",n_inside_time,&inside_time_shape);
00173 
00174     setTest(input,"hownear test",n_hownear,&hownear_shape);
00175     fp_hownear = fp_this_test;
00176 
00177     setTest(input,"hownear time test",n_hownear_time,&hownear_time_shape);
00178 
00179     setTest(input,"howfar test",n_howfar,&howfar_shape);
00180     fp_howfar = fp_this_test;
00181 
00182     setTest(input,"howfar time test",n_howfar_time,&howfar_time_shape);
00183 
00184 }
00185 
00186 void EGS_PrivateTester::setTest(EGS_Input *input, const char *delim, int &n,
00187         EGS_BaseShape **s) {
00188     EGS_Input *i = input->takeInputItem(delim);
00189     if( !i ) fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_PrivateTester::EGS_setTest: \n"
00190             "  no '%s' specification\n",delim);
00191     else {
00192         string shape_name;
00193         int ierr = i->getInput("bounding shape name",shape_name);
00194         EGS_BaseShape *shape = 0;
00195         if( !ierr ) shape = EGS_BaseShape::getShape(shape_name);
00196         if( !shape ) {
00197             EGS_Input *ishape = i->takeInputItem("bounding shape");
00198             if( !ishape ) fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_PrivateTester::EGS_setTest: \n"
00199                     "  no 'bounding shape' definition for %s\n",delim);
00200             else {
00201                 shape = EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape);
00202                 delete ishape;
00203             }
00204         }
00205         if( !shape ) fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_PrivateTester::EGS_PrivateTester:"
00206                     "\n  got null shape for %s\n",delim);
00207         else { shape->ref(); *s = shape; }
00208         int err = i->getInput("ntest",n);
00209         if( err ) fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_PrivateTester::setTest: \n"
00210                 "  missing/wrong 'ntest' input for %s\n",delim);
00211         string fname; fp_this_test = stdout;
00212         err = i->getInput("file name",fname);
00213         if( !err && fname.size() > 0 ) {
00214             fp_this_test = fopen(fname.c_str(),"w");
00215             if( !fp_this_test ) {
00216                 fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_PrivateTester::setTest: \n"
00217                   "  failed to open file %s from writing\n",fname.c_str());
00218                 fp_this_test = stdout;
00219             }
00220         }
00221         int ci; err = i->getInput("check infinity",ci);
00222         if( !err && ci == 0 ) check_infinity = false;
00223 
00224         string delimeter(delim);
00225         if( delimeter == "howfar time test") {
00226             string ss; i->getInput("store steps",ss);
00227             if( ss == "no" || ss == "0" ) {
00228                 fprintf(fp_info,"will not store steps in howfar test\n");
00229                 store_steps = false;
00230             }
00231         }
00232 
00233         delete i;
00234     }
00235 }
00236 
00237 void EGS_PrivateTester::testInside(EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00238     if( beginTest(n_inside,inside_shape,"testInside()","inside test",g) )
00239         return;
00240     int n_in = 0; fp_this_test = fp_inside;
00241     for(int j=0; j<n_inside; j++) {
00242         EGS_Vector x = inside_shape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00243         int ireg = g->inside(x);
00244         if( ireg >= 0 ) { n_in++; parent->printPosition(x); }
00245     }
00246     fprintf(fp_info,"finished inside test. Point inside: %d (%g)\n",
00247             n_in,((double) n_in)/((double) n_inside));
00248 }
00249 
00250 void EGS_PrivateTester::testInsideTime(EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00251     if( beginTest(n_inside_time,inside_time_shape,"testInsideTime()",
00252                 "inside time test",g) ) return;
00253     int n_in = 0;
00254     EGS_Timer t;
00255     for(int j=0; j<n_inside_time; j++) {
00256         EGS_Vector x = inside_time_shape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00257         int ireg = g->inside(x);
00258         if( ireg >= 0 ) n_in++;
00259     }
00260     EGS_Float cpu = t.time();
00261     fprintf(fp_info,"finished inside time test.\n");
00262     fprintf(fp_info,"   point inside: %d (%g)\n",n_in,
00263             ((double) n_in)/((double) n_inside_time));
00264     fprintf(fp_info,"   cpu time: %g seconds\n",cpu);
00265 }
00266 
00267 void EGS_PrivateTester::testHownear(int ntry, EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00268     if( ntry < 1 ) {
00269         fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_GeometryTester::testHownear(): ntry must be >0\n");
00270         return;
00271     }
00272     if( beginTest(n_hownear,hownear_shape,"testHownear()","hownear test",g) )
00273         return;
00274     int n_fail = 0;
00275     for(int j=0; j<n_hownear; j++) {
00276         EGS_Vector x = hownear_shape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00277         int ireg = g->inside(x); EGS_Float tperp = g->hownear(ireg,x);
00278         for(int i=0; i<ntry; i++) {
00279             EGS_Float cost = 2*rndm->getUniform()-1;
00280             EGS_Float sint = tperp*sqrt(1-cost*cost);
00281             EGS_Float cphi, sphi; rndm->getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00282             EGS_Vector xi(x.x+sint*cphi,x.y+sint*sphi,x.z+tperp*cost);
00283             int ireg_i = g->inside(xi);
00284             if( ireg_i != ireg ) {
00285                 n_fail++;
00286                 fprintf(fp_hownear," point (%g,%g,%g) with tperp=%g fails for "
00287            "(%g,%g,%g): %d %d\n",x.x,x.y,x.z,tperp,xi.x,xi.y,xi.z,ireg,ireg_i);
00288             }
00289         }
00290     }
00291     fprintf(fp_info,"finished hownear test. number of failed points: %d\n",
00292             n_fail);
00293 }
00294 
00295 void EGS_PrivateTester::testHownearTime(EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00296     if( beginTest(n_hownear_time,hownear_time_shape,"testHownearTime()",
00297                 "hownear time test",g) ) return;
00298     double sum_tperp = 0;
00299     EGS_Timer t;
00300     for(int j=0; j<n_hownear_time; j++) {
00301         EGS_Vector x = hownear_time_shape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00302         int ireg = g->inside(x);
00303         sum_tperp += g->hownear(ireg,x);
00304     }
00305     EGS_Float cpu = t.time();
00306     fprintf(fp_info,"finished hownear time test.\n");
00307     fprintf(fp_info,"   average tperp: %g\n",sum_tperp/n_hownear_time);
00308     fprintf(fp_info,"   cpu time: %g seconds\n",cpu);
00309 }
00310 
00311 
00312 #define N_MAX_STEP 200
00313 
00314 void EGS_PrivateTester::testHowfar(EGS_BaseGeometry *g, bool time) {
00315     EGS_Vector positions[N_MAX_STEP];
00316     int regions[N_MAX_STEP];
00317     int btest; int ncase;
00318     EGS_BaseShape *hshape;
00319     bool ss;
00320     if( time ) {
00321         ncase = n_howfar_time;
00322         btest = beginTest(n_howfar_time,howfar_time_shape,"testHowfarTime()",
00323                   "howfar time test",g);
00324         hshape = howfar_time_shape;
00325         ss = store_steps;
00326         fprintf(fp_info,"Store steps: %d\n",ss);
00327     }
00328     else {
00329         ncase = n_howfar;
00330         btest = beginTest(n_howfar,howfar_shape,"testHowfar()","howfar test",g);
00331         hshape = howfar_shape;
00332         ss = true;
00333     }
00334     if (btest) return;
00335     const EGS_AffineTransform *T = hshape->getTransform();
00336     egsWarning("has transofrmation: %d\n",(T != 0));
00337     //EGS_BaseGeometry::geometry_error = &__geometry_error;
00338     EGS_Timer timer; fp_this_test = fp_howfar;
00339     double nstep = 0;
00340     for(int j=0; j<ncase; j++) {
00341         EGS_Vector x = hshape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00342         EGS_Float cost = 2*rndm->getUniform()-1;
00343         EGS_Float sint = sqrt(1-cost*cost);
00344         EGS_Float cphi, sphi; rndm->getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00345         EGS_Vector u(sint*cphi,sint*sphi,cost);
00346         EGS_Vector Xo(x);
00347         bool go_back = true;
00348         //egsWarning("x = (%g,%g,%g) u = (%g,%g,%g)\n",x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z);
00349 retry:
00350         //if( !go_back ) egsWarning("Initial position: (%g,%g,%g) direction: "
00351         //      "(%g,%g,%g)\n",x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z);
00352         EGS_Float t_step = 1e15;
00353         int ireg = g->inside(x); int ireg_first = ireg;
00354         ireg = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t_step);
00355         if( ireg < 0 && ireg != ireg_first && !time ) {
00356             EGS_Vector tmp(x + u*t_step);
00357             parent->printPosition(tmp);
00358         }
00359         //egsWarning("ireg: %d new_ireg: %d t = %g\n",ireg_first,ireg,t_step);
00360         int n_step = 0;
00361         if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00362            x += u*t_step;
00363            if( ss ) { positions[n_step] = x; regions[n_step++] = ireg; }
00364            if (!time ) parent->printPosition(x);
00365         }
00366         //if( !go_back && ireg >= 0 ) egsWarning("Starting loop: ireg=%d "
00367         //       "x=(%g,%g,%g)\n",ireg,x.x,x.y,x.z);
00368         while( ireg >= 0 ) {
00369             t_step = 1e15; int ireg_new = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t_step);
00370             //if( !go_back ) egsWarning("new region=%d step=%g x=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00371             //        ireg_new,t_step,x.x,x.y,x.z);
00372             //if( __geometry_error ) {
00373             //    egsWarning("Geometry error occured\n");
00374             //    __geometry_error = 0;
00375             //    if( go_back ) {
00376             //        go_back = false; x = Xo; goto retry;
00377             //    }
00378             //}
00379             if( ireg_new == ireg ) break;
00380               // if the above condition is true,
00381               // we assume to be in an anfinite geometry with a direction
00382               // such that we never get out.
00383             ireg = ireg_new;
00384             x += u*t_step; nstep += 1;
00385             if( ss ) {
00386                 positions[n_step] = x; regions[n_step++] = ireg;
00387                 if( n_step >= N_MAX_STEP ) {
00388                     if( go_back ) {
00389                         egsWarning("testHowfar(): number of steps exceeded %d for"
00390                                 " case %d:\n",N_MAX_STEP,j+1);
00391                         egsWarning("  direction = (%g,%g,%g)\n",u.x,u.y,u.z);
00392                         egsWarning("  initial position = (%g,%g,%g) region = %d\n",
00393                                 Xo.x,Xo.y,Xo.z,ireg_first);
00394                         for(int j=0; j<N_MAX_STEP; j++)
00395                             egsWarning("x = (%g,%g,%g) ireg = %d\n",positions[j].x,
00396                                     positions[j].y,positions[j].z,regions[j]);
00397                         go_back = false; g->setDebug(true); x = Xo; goto retry;
00398                     }
00399                     egsFatal("\nQuiting now\n\n");
00400                 }
00401             }
00402             if( !time ) {
00403                 if( check_infinity && x.length2() > 1e10 ) {
00404                     egsWarning("testHowfar(): x -> infinity for case %d?\n",
00405                             j+1);
00406                     egsWarning("  direction = (%g,%g,%g)\n",u.x,u.y,u.z);
00407                     egsWarning("  initial position = (%g,%g,%g) region = %d\n",
00408                             Xo.x,Xo.y,Xo.z,ireg_first);
00409                     for(int j=0; j<n_step; j++) egsWarning("x = (%g,%g,%g) "
00410                         "ireg = %d\n",positions[j].x,positions[j].y,
00411                         positions[j].z,regions[j]);
00412                 }
00413                 if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00414                     int itest = g->inside(x);
00415                     if( itest < 0 ) {
00416                         egsWarning("testHowfar(): after howfar step ireg = %d"
00417                              " but inside() returns %d\n",ireg,itest);
00418                         egsWarning("  position = (%g,%g,%g)\n",x.x,x.y,x.z);
00419                         egsWarning("  direction = (%g,%g,%g)\n",u.x,u.y,u.z);
00420                         egsWarning("  initial position = (%g,%g,%g) "
00421                            "region = %d\n",Xo.x,Xo.y,Xo.z,ireg_first);
00422                         for(int j=0; j<n_step; j++) egsWarning("x = (%g,%g,%g) "
00423                           "ireg = %d\n",positions[j].x,positions[j].y,
00424                           positions[j].z,regions[j]);
00425                         break;
00426                     }
00427                 }
00428                 parent->printPosition(x);
00429             }
00430         }
00431     }
00432     EGS_Float cpu = timer.time();
00433     if( time ) {
00434         fprintf(fp_info,"finished howfar time test, cpu time = %g seconds\n",
00435                 cpu);
00436         fprintf(fp_info,"  average number of steps: %g\n",nstep/ncase);
00437     }
00438     else fprintf(fp_info,"finished howfar test.\n");
00439 }
00440 
00441 
00442 int EGS_PrivateTester::beginTest(int n, const EGS_BaseShape *s,
00443         const char *func, const char *name, const EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00444     if( !s ) {
00445         fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_GeometryTester::%s: no bounding shape defined\n",
00446                 func); return 1;
00447     }
00448     if( n <= 0 ) {
00449         fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_GeometryTester::%s: number of test cases to run "
00450              "is less than 1 (%d)\n",func,n); return 2;
00451     }
00452     fprintf(fp_info,"\nEGS_GeometryTester::%s: starting %s\n",func,name);
00453     fprintf(fp_info,"   number of cases: %d\n",n);
00454     fprintf(fp_info,"   bounding shape: %s\n",s->getObjectType().c_str());
00455     //fprintf(fp_info,"   geometry:\n"); g->printInfo();
00456     fprintf(fp_info,"   geometry: %s (type %s)\n",g->getName().c_str(),
00457             g->getType().c_str());
00458     return 0;
00459 }
00460 #endif
00461 
00462 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00463 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_CylTester : public EGS_GeometryTester {
00464 public:
00465     EGS_CylTester(const EGS_Vector &A,EGS_Input *i) :
00466         EGS_GeometryTester(i), a(A) { a.normalize(); };
00467     ~EGS_CylTester() {};
00468     void printPosition(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00469         EGS_Float z = x*a; EGS_Float r = sqrt(x.length2()-z*z);
00470         fprintf(p->fp_this_test,"%g %g\n",z,r);
00471     };
00472 private:
00473     EGS_Vector a;
00474 };
00475 
00476 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_SphereTester : public EGS_GeometryTester {
00477 public:
00478     EGS_SphereTester(const EGS_Vector &Xo, EGS_Input *i) :
00479         xo(Xo), EGS_GeometryTester(i) {};
00480     ~EGS_SphereTester() {};
00481     void printPosition(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00482         EGS_Vector xp(x-xo); EGS_Float r2 = xp.length2();
00483         fprintf(p->fp_this_test,"%g %g\n",xp.z,sqrt(r2-xp.z*xp.z));
00484     };
00485 private:
00486     EGS_Vector xo;
00487 };
00488 
00489 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_TransformedTester : public EGS_GeometryTester {
00490 public:
00491     EGS_TransformedTester(const EGS_AffineTransform &t, EGS_Input *i) :
00492             T(t), EGS_GeometryTester(i) {};
00493     ~EGS_TransformedTester() {};
00494     void printPosition(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00495         EGS_Vector xp(x*T);
00496         fprintf(p->fp_this_test,"%g %g %g\n",xp.x,xp.y,xp.z);
00497     };
00498 private:
00499     EGS_AffineTransform T;
00500 };
00501 #endif
00502 
00503 EGS_GeometryTester* EGS_GeometryTester::getGeometryTester(EGS_Input *input) {
00504     if( !input ) { egsWarning("EGS_GeometryTester::getGeometryTester:\n"
00505             "  input is null?\n"); return 0;
00506     }
00507     bool delete_it = false; EGS_Input *i;
00508     if( input->isA("geometry tester") ) i = input;
00509     else {
00510         i = input->takeInputItem("geometry tester");
00511         if( !i ) {
00512             egsWarning("EGS_GeometryTester::getGeometryTester:\n"
00513               "  no 'geometry tester' input\n"); return 0;
00514         }
00515         delete_it = true;
00516     }
00517     EGS_Input *ishape;
00518     while( (ishape = i->takeInputItem("bounding shape")) ) {
00519         egsWarning("*** adding shape\n");
00520         EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape); delete ishape;
00521     }
00522     string type; EGS_GeometryTester *tester;
00523     int err = i->getInput("output type",type);
00524     if( err || i->compare(type,"normal") )
00525         tester = new EGS_GeometryTester(i);
00526     else if( i->compare(type,"cylindrical") ) {
00527         vector<EGS_Float> axis;
00528         int err1 = i->getInput("axis",axis);
00529         if( !err1 && axis.size() == 3 )
00530             tester = new EGS_CylTester(EGS_Vector(axis[0],axis[1],axis[2]),i);
00531         else {
00532             egsWarning("EGS_GeometryTester::getGeometryTester: no 'axis'"
00533                   " input for cylindrical output type\n");
00534             tester = new EGS_GeometryTester(i);
00535         }
00536     }
00537     else if( i->compare(type,"spherical") ) {
00538         vector<EGS_Float> Xo;
00539         int err1 = i->getInput("midpoint",Xo);
00540         if( !err1 && Xo.size() == 3 )
00541             tester = new EGS_SphereTester(EGS_Vector(Xo[0],Xo[1],Xo[2]),i);
00542         else
00543             tester = new EGS_SphereTester(EGS_Vector(),i);
00544     }
00545     else if( i->compare(type,"transformed") ) {
00546         EGS_AffineTransform *t = EGS_AffineTransform::getTransformation(i);
00547         if( !t ) {
00548             egsWarning("EGS_GeometryTester::getGeometryTester: no "
00549                "transformation defined for a transformed tester\n");
00550             tester = new EGS_GeometryTester(i);
00551         } else {
00552             tester = new EGS_TransformedTester(*t,i); delete t;
00553         }
00554     }
00555     else {
00556         egsWarning("EGS_GeometryTester::getGeometryTester: unknown tester"
00557                 " type %s\n",type.c_str());
00558         tester = new EGS_GeometryTester(i);
00559     }
00560     if( delete_it ) delete i;
00561     return tester;
00562 }
